content: mc = main color k2tog = knit 2 stitches together instructions ribbing using the contrasting color cc with the long-tail cast on method or your favorite method of casting on cast on 54 60 66 72 78 84 stitches *for a tighter-fitting ribbing you can go down to a us 10 6 00 mm a needle size but that is not necessary join in the round being careful not to twist the stitches place a marker to indicate the beginning of the round for tips on how to join in the round being careful not to twist visit this article and youtube video https //www sierraandpine in stockinette stitch knit every round rounds 1-8 knit every stitch using mc round 9 knit every stitch using cc repeat rounds 1-9 until the piece measures approximately 6 7 7 7 5 8 8 5 inches 15 16 5 16 5 18 20 21 cm from the cast-on edge crown decreases switch to double-pointed needles when necessary or use a longer needle for the magic loop method round 1 slip beginning of round m *k2tog k7 k8 k9 k10 k11 k12 pm * repeat to the end of the round round 2 knit all stitches round 3 *sl m k2tog k until m * repeat to the end of the round repeat rounds 2 and 3 until you have 12 stitches remaining remember to switch to the cc every 9 rounds patternby@sierraandpine foryourpersonalenjoymentonly donotsellthepattern patternsupportthroughravelry messageme@ccouturier oremailsierraandpine@gmail com 4 finishing cut the yarn leaving a 6-inch tail thread the tail through a tapestry needle and slide it through the remaining stitches twice remove the stitches from the needles and pull tight to close
